name: URLCache.StoragePolicy
desc: These constants specify the caching strategy used by an CachedURLResponse object.

items.name: case allowed
items.desc: Storage in URLCache is allowed without restriction.

items.name: case allowedInMemoryOnly
items.desc: Storage in URLCache is allowed; however storage should be restricted to memory only.

items.name: case notAllowed
items.desc: Storage in URLCache is not allowed in any fashion, either in memory or on disk.
